metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23362 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package hosted-git-info before 3.0.8 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via regular expression shortcutMatch in the fromUrl function in index.js. The affected regular expression exhibits polynomial worst-case time complexity.

criterions.comment: node-hosted-git-info: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
